includeUpgradeCandidates.title:
Demo parity: show "what to upgrade" without additional Forward calls by reusing
preloaded rollups/inventory.

routing.title: Optional knobs preserved for future tabs, even if not used everywhere yet.

includeReturnPath.title:
If true, request a return path candidate from Forward so we can evaluate return
enforcement/symmetry.

importItemIdsByKind.description: live Forward calls, so there may be no import items.
importItemIdsByKind.title: Kept for API compatibility. This backend computes summary directly from

headroomGbps.title: Headroom at the selected threshold (e.g. 0.85) for the chosen util value.

forwardQueryUrl.title:
Forward application URL for deeper interactive analysis (intentionally delegated
to Forward UI).

unmatchedHopInterfacesSample.title: Diagnostics for partial-coverage environments (helps explain "unknown" results).

skyforge.GovernancePolicy.description: All limits are optional. A value of 0 means "unlimited/disabled".

allowCustomTemplateRepos.description: This is distinct from "external" because "custom" can reference arbitrary repos and is therefore riskier.
allowCustomTemplateRepos.title:
AllowCustomTemplateRepos controls whether non-admin users may use template
source = custom.

allowUserByosContainerlabServers.title:
AllowUserByosContainerlabServers controls whether non-admin users may use
per-user Containerlab BYOS servers (user:... refs).

allowUserByosNetlabServers.title:
AllowUserByosNetlabServers controls whether non-admin users may use per-user
Netlab BYOS servers (user:... refs).

allowUserExternalTemplateRepos.title:
AllowUserExternalTemplateRepos controls whether non-admin users may use template
source = external (per-user external repos).

maxCollectorsPerUser.title:
MaxCollectorsPerUser caps the number of in-cluster Forward collectors a user can
create.

maxDeploymentsPerUser.title:
MaxDeploymentsPerUser caps the number of deployment definitions a user can
create.

skyforge.GovernancePolicy.title: GovernancePolicy is a lightweight guardrail layer (admin-configurable).

skyforge.SkyforgeUserContext.description: NOTE: This type must live in the service package (not a type alias to an internal package) to satisfy Encore's API schema rules.

allowCustomEveServers.title:
EVE-NG deployments require an endpoint. This flag enables configuring a per-user
EVE server.

skyforge.SkyforgeUserContext.title:
SkyforgeUserContext is the user-facing context object stored in Postgres and
returned by the API.

skyforge.TemplateValidationKind.title:
TemplateValidationKind is a legacy name used by existing UI flows. It no longer
implies AI usage.

get.summary: FrontendAdmin serves the SPA for admin routes.
GetAdminAudit returns audit events (admin only).

get.description: This endpoint is meant for self-diagnosis: it reports the config actually seen by the running API process (including defaults), plus a list of required fields that are missing.
get.summary:
GetAdminEffectiveConfig returns the effective (non-secret) typed Encore config
(admin only).

post.summary: AdminE2ESession seeds a session cookie for CI/E2E flows without external SSO.

post.description:
This is primarily used by \`cmd/e2echeck\` so E2E tests can run without local kubectl access.

NOTE: This does not authenticate to the target device; it only verifies TCP connect and an SSH-like banner prefix ("SSH-").
post.summary:
AdminSSHProbe runs an in-cluster TCP probe to validate SSH reachability of a
list of hosts.

get.summary: GetAdminForwardMetricsPollState returns runtime poll settings and freshness.

post.summary:
AdminForwardMetricsSync triggers a best-effort global sync for all known Forward
networks.

get.summary: GetAdminForwardOnPremBackupRuns lists recent backup apply/reconcile run records.

GetAdminForwardOnPremBackupS3 returns current stored S3 backup settings
(masked).

put.summary:
PutAdminForwardOnPremBackupS3 upserts S3 backup settings and reconciles them to
Forward workloads.

post.summary:
PostAdminForwardOnPremBackupS3Reconcile re-applies stored backup settings to
Kubernetes.
AdminForwardOnPremScaleDown is an internal helper endpoint for debugging.

get.summary:
GetAdminForwardOnPremStatus returns a concise status snapshot for Forward
on-prem.
ListGovernanceCosts lists cost snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceCosts ingests cost snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: GetGovernancePolicy returns the current governance policy (admin only).

put.summary: UpdateGovernancePolicy updates the governance policy (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceResources lists tracked resources (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceResources ingests resource inventory (admin only).

get.summary: GetGovernanceSummary returns governance summary metrics (admin only).

post.summary: SyncGovernanceSources refreshes inventory from known sources (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceUsage lists usage snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceUsage ingests usage snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: GetAdminImpersonateStatus returns current impersonation status (admin only).

get.description: Data is a short-lived snapshot stored in Redis by Telegraf.
get.summary: ListNodeMetrics returns a lightweight, live view of node metrics (admin only).

get.description: This is intended to answer: "are tasks queued because of real backlog, or because queue event delivery/worker execution is broken?"
get.summary: TaskQueueDiag provides admin diagnostics for the task queue.

post.description: This is an admin-only manual guardrail; the worker also runs an automatic reconciler via cron.

limit.title: Limit caps the number of queued tasks to republish.

post.summary: ReconcileQueuedTasks republishes queue events for tasks stuck in "queued".

post.description: This is an admin-only manual guardrail; the worker also runs an automatic reconciler via cron.

hardMaxRuntimeMinutes.title:
HardMaxRuntimeMinutes marks tasks as failed when they have been running longer
than this.

limit.title: Limit caps the number of running tasks to consider.

maxIdleMinutes.title: MaxIdleMinutes marks tasks as failed when they have had no logs for this long.

post.summary: ReconcileRunningTasks marks tasks that appear stuck in "running" as failed.

post.description: This is intended for development environments where you want to rerun "first-login" bootstrap (Gitea user/provisioning, default user context, etc).
post.summary: PurgeUser removes a user and their state (admin only).

get.summary: ListArtifacts lists artifacts for the authenticated user.
DownloadArtifact downloads one artifact payload for the authenticated user.

post.summary:
CreateArtifactFolder creates an artifact folder prefix for the authenticated
user.

delete.summary: DeleteArtifactObject deletes one artifact object for the authenticated user.

post.summary: PutArtifactObject writes one artifact object for the authenticated user.

UploadArtifact uploads content and returns stored key metadata for the
authenticated user.

get.summary: ListAwsSSOAccounts returns accounts available for the current SSO session.
ListAwsSSORoles returns roles for a selected AWS account.
GetAwsSSOConfig returns the configured AWS SSO start URL and region.

post.summary: LogoutAwsSSO clears any stored AWS SSO tokens.
PollAwsSSO polls for device authorization completion.
StartAwsSSO begins the AWS device authorization flow.

get.summary: GetAwsSSOStatus returns connection status for the authenticated user.
AzurePortalRedirect opens the Azure portal with a login hint.

post.summary:
SyncBlueprintCatalog syncs the user's default blueprint catalog into the
personal repo.

get.summary:
GetForwardNetworkCapacityPortfolioUser returns portfolio stats across user's
Forward networks.

post.summary: ValidateAwsSSO checks that AWS SSO credentials can mint role credentials.

ListAzureSubscriptions returns available subscriptions for the provided service
principal.
ValidateAzureSP verifies Azure service principal credentials.
ListGCPProjects returns accessible projects for the provided service account.
ValidateGCPServiceAccount verifies GCP service account JSON by minting a token.

get.summary: CoderLaunch redirects authenticated users to the configured Coder landing page.

GetContainerlabTemplates returns containerlab templates for the authenticated
user.

template.title: Template is the filename to write under TemplatesDir.

templatesDir.description:
Default: "containerlab/designer".

For this endpoint, TemplatesDir must be under "containerlab/".

SaveContainerlabTopologyYAMLUser stores containerlab topology YAML in the user
repo.

get.summary: DashboardEvents streams a dashboard snapshot as Server-Sent Events (SSE).

get.summary: DashboardSnapshot returns the latest dashboard snapshot.

context.

name.title: Name becomes the Skyforge deployment name (and drives the lab name).

templateSource.description: For now, only "user" is supported by this endpoint.

templatesDir.title: TemplatesDir is the repo-relative directory containing the YAML.

template.

autoDeploy.title: AutoDeploy queues an initial "create" action after creating the deployment.

name.title: Name becomes the Skyforge deployment name (and drives the clabernetes lab name).

template.title: Template is the filename to write under TemplatesDir.

templatesDir.title: TemplatesDir is where we store the YAML inside the user repo.

topologyYAML.title: TopologyYAML is the raw containerlab topology YAML.

CreateClabernetesDeploymentFromYAMLUser creates clabernetes deployment from
YAML.

netlabServer.description: If omitted, we fall back to the user's default.

CreateContainerlabDeploymentFromTemplateUser creates containerlab deployment
from template.

autoDeploy.title: AutoDeploy queues an initial "create" action after creating the deployment.

Name becomes the Skyforge deployment name (and drives the containerlab lab
name).

CreateContainerlabDeploymentFromYAMLUser creates containerlab deployment from
YAML.

parameters.description: Alternate casing used by some UI clients.
parameters.name: forwardDelete

delete.summary:
DeleteDeployment deletes a deployment in the authenticated user's personal
context.

put.summary:
UpdateDeployment updates a deployment in the authenticated user's personal
context.

post.summary:
RunDeploymentAction runs a deployment action in the authenticated user's
personal context.

get.summary: GetDeploymentCapacityGrowth returns capacity growth data for a deployment.
GetDeploymentCapacityInventory returns capacity inventory for a deployment.

post.summary:
PostDeploymentCapacityDeviceMetricsHistory returns device metrics history for
selected devices.

PostDeploymentCapacityInterfaceMetricsHistory returns interface metrics history
for selected interfaces.

get.summary:
GetDeploymentCapacityUnhealthyDevices returns unhealthy devices from capacity
perf data.

post.summary:
GetDeploymentCapacityUnhealthyInterfaces returns unhealthy interfaces from
capacity perf data.

deploymentId.description: Defaults to the deployment id in the path.
deploymentId.title: Optional override; primarily for debugging.

post.summary: RefreshDeploymentCapacityRollups refreshes capacity rollups for a deployment.

get.summary: GetDeploymentCapacitySummary returns capacity summary for a deployment.

post.summary:
DestroyDeployment destroys a deployment in the authenticated user's personal
context.

put.summary: UpdateDeploymentForwardConfig stores deployment Forward settings.

post.summary: SyncDeploymentForward synchronizes deployment devices to Forward.

get.summary: GetDeploymentInfo returns deployment runtime details for the authenticated user.
GetDeploymentInventory returns inventory data for a deployment.

post.summary: UpdateDeploymentLinkAdmin toggles link admin-state up/down.
CaptureDeploymentLinkPcap captures packets on one side of a deployment link.
SetDeploymentLinkImpairment applies impairment controls to a deployment link.

get.summary: GetDeploymentLinkStats returns current link counters for a deployment.

DeploymentLinkStatsEventsUser streams link stats snapshots without context path
parameters.
GetDeploymentNetlabGraph returns a rendered netlab graph for a deployment.

post.summary: NetlabConnectForDeployment proxies netlab connect for a deployment.

get.summary: GetDeploymentNodeDescribe returns node pod status.
GetDeploymentNodeInterfaces returns node interfaces and counters.
GetDeploymentNodeLogs returns node logs.
GetDeploymentNodeRunningConfig returns running config for a NOS node.

post.summary: SaveDeploymentNodeConfig persists a node startup config when supported.

delete.summary:
DeploymentNodeWebUIProxyUserDelete proxies WebUI DELETE requests without context
path parameters.

get.summary:
DeploymentNodeWebUIProxyUserGet proxies WebUI GET requests without context path
parameters.

patch.summary:
DeploymentNodeWebUIProxyUserPatch proxies WebUI PATCH requests without context
path parameters.

post.summary:
DeploymentNodeWebUIProxyUserPost proxies WebUI POST requests without context
path parameters.

put.summary:
DeploymentNodeWebUIProxyUserPut proxies WebUI PUT requests without context path
parameters.

post.summary:
StartDeployment starts a deployment in the authenticated user's personal
context.
StopDeployment stops a deployment in the authenticated user's personal context.

get.summary:
TerminalExecWSUser provides terminal websocket access without context path
parameters.
GetDeploymentTopology returns topology graph data for a deployment.
ListDeploymentUIEvents lists persisted UI events for a deployment.

DeploymentUIEventsStreamUser streams deployment UI events without context path
parameters.

post.description: This enables "SSO" without needing to store or reuse the user's password.
post.summary:
DNSBootstrap provisions a per-user Technitium account + zone and stores a
long-lived API token in Skyforge.

get.description:
NOTE: Technitium uses localStorage tokens (not cookies). This endpoint serves a tiny HTML page that:

 1. fetches a token from Skyforge Server
 2. stores it in localStorage
 3. redirects to /dns/
get.summary:
DNSSSO bridges Skyforge auth into Technitium DNS by storing a minted token in
localStorage and redirecting.

get.description: The token is stored client-side (localStorage) by the DNS SSO bridge.
get.summary: DNSToken mints a Technitium session token for the current Skyforge user session.
GetEveNgTemplates lists EVE-NG templates for the authenticated user.

post.summary: ConvertEveLab converts an EVE lab to topology YAML for the authenticated user.
ImportEveLab imports an EVE lab into a deployment for the authenticated user.

get.summary: ListEveLabs lists EVE labs for the authenticated user.
ListEveServers returns EVE server configs for the authenticated user.

put.summary: UpsertEveServer upserts one EVE server config for the authenticated user.

delete.summary: DeleteEveServer deletes one EVE server config for the authenticated user.
ClearUserForwardCollector deletes the stored user Forward collector settings.

get.summary:
GetUserForwardCollector returns the authenticated user's Forward collector
settings.

put.summary:
PutUserForwardCollector stores Forward credentials and ensures a per-user
collector exists.

get.summary:
ListUserForwardCollectorConfigs lists Forward collector configurations managed
by Skyforge for the current user.

post.summary:
CreateUserForwardCollectorConfig creates a new Forward collector configuration
and deploys a matching in-cluster collector.

delete.description: It intentionally does NOT delete the Forward-side collector.
delete.summary:
DeleteUserForwardCollectorConfig deletes the in-cluster resources for a
collector config and removes it from Skyforge.

get.summary:
GetUserForwardCollectorConfigLogs returns the collector's `clientd.log` (or a
fallback log) for debugging.

post.summary:
RestartUserForwardCollectorConfig restarts the collector Deployment (best-effort
image update).

get.summary:
GetUserForwardCollectorConfigRuntime returns runtime state for a configured
collector.

GetUserCollectorLogs returns recent log lines from the user's in-cluster
collector pod.

post.description: NOTE: This does not delete any existing collector in Forward; it only updates the Skyforge profile.
post.summary:
ResetUserForwardCollector rotates the user's Forward collector by creating a new
one and storing its authorization key.

post.description: This is used to pull down a newer image when using \`:latest\`.
post.summary:
RestartUserCollector triggers a rolling restart of the user's in-cluster
collector Deployment.

get.summary:
GetUserCollectorRuntime returns the in-cluster runtime status for the user's
collector.

ListForwardCollectors lists collectors visible to the authenticated user's
Forward account.

ListUserForwardCredentialSets lists Forward credential sets owned by the current
user.

post.summary:
CreateUserForwardCredentialSet creates a Forward credential set owned by the
current user.

delete.description: Deletion is blocked if the credential set is referenced elsewhere.
delete.summary:
DeleteUserForwardCredentialSet deletes a Forward credential set owned by the
current user.

put.summary:
UpdateUserForwardCredentialSet updates a Forward credential set owned by the
current user.

get.description: \- the requested credentialId (must be user-owned Forward credentials), or - the caller's defaultForwardCredentialId in /api/user/settings.

get.description: Envoy (forward-app-proxy) rewrites /fwd/\* to /api/forward/onprem/proxy/\* so the server can wake the Forward workloads before proxying.
get.summary:
ForwardOnPremProxyGET proxies a Forward on-prem UI/API request under Skyforge
SSO.
FrontendBuildManifest serves the embedded frontend build metadata manifest.
ListUserForwardNetworks lists saved Forward networks for the current user.

post.summary: CreateUserForwardNetwork stores a Forward network id for the current user.

delete.summary:
DeleteUserForwardNetwork deletes a saved Forward network (by uuid id or by
forwardNetworkId).

post.summary:
SeedForwardNetworkAssuranceDemoUser seeds demo assurance entities for a Forward
network.

RefreshForwardNetworkAssuranceUser refreshes assurance summary for a Forward
network.

baselineSnapshotId.description: the backend will run a second Forward paths-bulk against this snapshot and compute a diff.
baselineSnapshotId.title:
Optional baseline snapshot for routing regression comparisons. If set (and
routing is enabled),

post.summary: PostForwardNetworkAssuranceStudioEvaluateUser evaluates ad-hoc NQE checks.

post.summary:
CreateForwardNetworkAssuranceStudioScenarioUser creates an assurance studio
scenario.

delete.summary: DeleteForwardNetworkAssuranceStudioScenarioUser deletes a scenario.

get.summary: GetForwardNetworkAssuranceStudioScenarioUser fetches a scenario.

put.summary: UpdateForwardNetworkAssuranceStudioScenarioUser updates a scenario.

parameters.description: Fresh bypasses the short server-side cache and forces live Forward calls. Accepts 1/true/yes.
parameters.name: fresh

GetForwardNetworkAssuranceSummaryUser returns assurance summary for a Forward
network.
ListForwardNetworkAssuranceSummaryHistoryUser returns assurance summary history.

includeAcl.title: if true, also asks Forward for networkFunctions and returns ACL info (slower)

includeHops.title: include compact hop lists in response

projectLoad.title: if true, includes projected utilization numbers per bottleneck

post.summary: PostForwardNetworkAssuranceTrafficEvaluateUser evaluates traffic scenarios.

includeGroups.title: if true, tagParts also match groupNames (default true)

tagParts.description: For mode=mesh: TagParts/NameParts/DeviceTypes are applied to a single endpoint set. For mode=cross: Src\* filters build the source set, Dst\* filters build the destination set.
tagParts.title: Filters applied to the NQE-discovered device endpoints.

post.summary: PostForwardNetworkAssuranceTrafficSeedsUser creates traffic scenario seed data.

get.summary:
GetForwardNetworkCapacityCoverageUser returns coverage summary for
path-bottleneck/capacity sources.

network.

GetForwardNetworkCapacityInventoryUser returns capacity inventory for a Forward
network.

includeHops.title:
If true, includes a minimal hop list in the response. Default false to keep this
view capacity-focused.

snapshotId.title:
Optional Forward snapshot to compute the path against. If omitted, Forward uses
the latest processed snapshot.

PostForwardNetworkCapacityPathBottlenecksUser evaluates path bottlenecks for one
or more paths.

history proxy payload.

payload.

proxy payload.

Forward network.

network.

network.

GiteaPublicSSO logs into Gitea with a read-only public account.
GetAPIHealth returns a summary of database health.
GetLDAPHealth checks LDAP connectivity.

delete.summary: DeleteForwardConfig removes the authenticated user's Forward integration config.

put.summary: PutForwardConfig updates the authenticated user's Forward integration config.

ApplyForwardCredentialSet applies a user-owned Forward credential set to active
Forward integration config.

get.summary: ListForwardCollectors lists collectors from the configured Forward instance.

MCPForwardNetworkMessage receives JSON-RPC messages for a Forward SSE session
without user-context path parameters.

post.summary:
MCPForwardNetworkRPC exposes a Forward MCP JSON-RPC endpoint without
user-context path parameters.

get.summary:
MCPForwardNetworkSSE exposes an SSE-based transport for Forward MCP calls
without user-context path parameters.

post.summary: MCPMessage receives JSON-RPC messages for an SSE session.
MCPRPC exposes a Skyforge-hosted MCP JSON-RPC endpoint (tools/list, tools/call).

get.description:
Connect first to obtain a session\_id:

	GET /api/mcp/sse

Then POST JSON-RPC payloads to:

	POST /api/mcp/message?session_id=<id>
get.summary: MCPSSE exposes an SSE-based MCP transport suitable for remote clients.
GetNetlabRuns returns recent Netlab runs for the authenticated user.
ListNetlabServers returns netlab server configs for the authenticated user.

put.summary: UpsertNetlabServer upserts one netlab server config for the authenticated user.

delete.summary: DeleteNetlabServer deletes one netlab server config for the authenticated user.

get.summary: GetNetlabServerHealth probes netlab server health for the authenticated user.
GetNetlabStats returns basic Netlab server stats for the status dashboard.

parameters.description: repo-relative file within Dir (may include subdirs)
parameters.name: template

get.summary: GetNetlabTemplate returns one netlab template file.
GetNetlabTemplates returns netlab templates for the authenticated user.

template.title: Template is the filename to write under TemplatesDir.

templatesDir.description:
Default: "netlab/designer".

For this endpoint, TemplatesDir must be under "netlab/" or "blueprints/netlab/".
templatesDir.title: TemplatesDir is where we store the YAML inside the user repo.

topologyYAML.title: TopologyYAML is the raw netlab topology YAML.

setOverrides.description: They are only used by the in-cluster netlab generator (netlab-c9s), not BYOS netlab.
setOverrides.title:
SetOverrides are netlab CLI `--set` overrides (highest precedence) applied
during validation.

template.title: repo-relative file within Dir (may include subdirs)

post.summary: ValidateNetlabTemplate validates netlab template expansion.

get.description:
This endpoint is intended to reduce portal-side polling. It streams a small "snapshot" payload whenever notifications change for the authenticated user.

Query params: - include\_read=true|false (default false) - limit=1..100 (default 50)
get.summary: NotificationsEvents streams notifications as Server-Sent Events (SSE).
OIDCCallback finishes the OIDC flow and issues the Skyforge session cookie.
OIDCLogin starts the Dex OIDC auth flow and stores state/nonce cookies.
ListPKICerts lists issued certificates for the current user.
DownloadPKICert returns the certificate + key bundle for a specific cert.

post.summary: RevokePKICert marks a certificate revoked.
IssuePKICert issues a TLS certificate signed by the Skyforge CA.

get.summary: GetPKIRoot returns the root CA certificate.
ListPKISSHCerts lists issued SSH certificates for the current user.
DownloadPKISSHCert returns the SSH certificate + key bundle for a specific cert.

post.summary: RevokePKISSHCert marks an SSH certificate revoked.
IssuePKISSHCert issues an SSH user certificate signed by the Skyforge SSH CA.

get.summary: GetPKISSHRoot returns the SSH CA public key.

authenticated user.

WaivePolicyReportRecertAssignment waives one assignment.

get.summary: ListPolicyReportExceptions lists governance exceptions.

linked network.

network.

network.

GetPolicyReportPacks returns the embedded Policy Reports packs for the
authenticated user.

enforcementDeviceTypes.title:
"Enforcement" matching rules. If omitted, defaults to firewall-like device
types.

requireEnforcement.title: If true, findings are generated when the computed path doesn't traverse

requireReturnEnforcement.title: If true, findings are generated when a return path exists but doesn't traverse

requireSymmetricDelivery.description: return path is not DELIVERED (helps detect asymmetric failures). Default false.
requireSymmetricDelivery.title: If true, findings are generated when Forward computes a return path and the

post.summary: PostPolicyReportPathsEnforcementBypass evaluates bypass queries.
PostPolicyReportPathsEnforcementBypassStore stores bypass query results.

parameters.description: NOTE: Encore does not support \*bool in query parameters; use tri-state parsing. Accepted: "true" | "false" (case-insensitive). Empty means "any".
parameters.name: enabled

get.summary: ListPolicyReportPresets lists report presets.

post.summary: CreatePolicyReportPreset creates a report preset.

delete.summary: DeletePolicyReportPreset deletes a report preset.

put.summary: UpdatePolicyReportPreset updates a report preset.

post.summary: RunPolicyReportPreset executes a report preset.

get.summary: ListPolicyReportRuns lists policy runs.

post.summary: CreatePolicyReportRun creates a policy run record.

ListPolicyReportRunFindings lists findings for one run.
GetPolicyReportRunReport returns a rendered report payload.

get.description:
Uses Docker Registry HTTP API v2 \`\_catalog\`.

Env: - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_URL (required), e.g. [https://ghcr.io](https://ghcr.io) - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_USERNAME / SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_PASSWORD (optional) - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_SKIP\_TLS\_VERIFY (optional: true/false) - SKYFORGE\_REGISTRY\_REPO\_PREFIXES (optional comma-separated prefixes to include)

Query: - q: substring match filter - n: server-side page size for \_catalog
get.summary: ListRegistryRepos returns available repositories from the configured registry.

ListRegistryTags returns tags for a specific repository from the configured
registry.
GetRuns returns recent runs from native Skyforge tasks.

post.summary: CreateRun is a reserved endpoint for admin-triggered native tasks.
CancelRun cancels a queued or running task.

get.description: This is implemented as a raw endpoint so it can hold a long-lived HTTP connection.
get.summary: RunEvents streams task output as Server-Sent Events (SSE).

get.description: The stream is backed by \`sf\_task\_events\` and supports \`Last-Event-ID\` replay.
get.summary:
TaskLifecycleEvents streams structured task lifecycle events as Server-Sent
Events (SSE).
GetRunOutput returns output for a specific native task.

SessionForwardAuth is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint used by Traefik
forwardAuth.

head.summary:
SessionForwardAuthHead is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint used by
Traefik forwardAuth (HEAD).

get.description:
It behaves like SessionForwardAuth on success, but on unauthenticated requests it returns a 302 redirect to Skyforge login, preserving the original request URI via the \`next\` parameter.

NOTE: Envoy's ext\_authz filter commonly forwards the original request path in \`x-envoy-original-path\` (preferred) rather than \`x-forwarded-uri\`.
get.summary: SessionForwardAuthEnvoy is a Skyforge SSO gate endpoint for Envoy ext_authz.

get.description: configured prefix (e.g. \`/api/session/forwardauth/envoy/\`), so we also expose wildcard handlers.

NOTE: Envoy's ext_authz `path_prefix` can append the original request path to
the

SleepElasticTools scales in-cluster Elasticsearch + Kibana to 0 replicas (admin

WakeElasticTools scales in-cluster Elasticsearch + Kibana to 1 replica

FrontendAssets serves hashed frontend assets built by Vite.
FrontendDashboard serves the SPA for dashboard routes.
PlatformHealth serves the platform health payload.
FrontendDesign serves the SPA design sandbox route.
FrontendDocs serves embedded UI docs pages.
FrontendFavicon serves the SPA favicon (and compatibility icon paths).
CheckAll performs a comprehensive health check of all system components.
Check is a simple health check helper that verifies the application is running.

post.summary: WebhookIngestAny receives webhook events via tokenized URLs.

get.summary: FrontendIndex serves the SPA entrypoint.

post.description: This is used to build a lightweight "live node metrics" view without deploying a full monitoring stack. Data is stored as a short-lived snapshot in Redis.
post.summary:
IngestNodeMetric accepts host/node metrics from in-cluster collectors
(Telegraf).

post.description: Expected payload is Telegraf JSON serializer output for \`inputs.snmp\_trap\`.
post.summary: IngestSNMPTrap accepts SNMP trap events from in-cluster collectors (Telegraf).

post.description: This endpoint is intentionally unauthenticated (SSO) and guarded by an internal token header.
post.summary:
IngestSyslog accepts syslog events from in-cluster collectors (Vector/Fluent
Bit/etc).
CronCloudCredentialChecksBridge triggers cloud credential checks maintenance.
CronUserContextSyncBridge triggers user-context sync maintenance.
CronWorkerHeartbeatBridge triggers the worker heartbeat task.

CronProcessQueuedTasksFallbackBridge triggers DB-backed fallback processing for
queued tasks.
CronReconcileQueuedTasksBridge triggers reconciliation for queued tasks.
CronReconcileRunningTasksBridge triggers reconciliation for running tasks.
Cron job: run due Policy Reports presets.

post.description: This is intended to be called from a CronJob in-cluster using SKYFORGE\_INTERNAL\_TOKEN.
post.summary:
ElasticAutosleepTick checks for inactivity and scales Elastic tools down to 0
when idle.

post.description: This is used to detect whether any worker pods are alive when tasks are queued.
post.summary: CronWorkerHeartbeat upserts a task worker heartbeat for this worker instance.

post.description:
appear stuck in "queued".

This avoids the "queued forever" failure mode when Pub/Sub delivery is delayed/unavailable. The primary mechanism is still Pub/Sub; this only kicks in after a minimum queued age.
post.summary:
CronProcessQueuedTasksFallback is a DB-backed fallback that starts tasks
directly when they

CronReconcileQueuedTasks republishes queue events for tasks stuck in the
"queued" state.

CronReconcileRunningTasks finds long-running tasks that appear stuck and marks
them failed.

get.summary:
LogoutAll clears the Skyforge cookie and redirects to the landing page (used for
manual "reset").
FrontendManifest serves the PWA manifest.

NautobotLogout clears the Skyforge session cookie and redirects to the Skyforge
landing page.
NautobotLogoutAny handles `/nautobot/logout/*` (including a trailing slash).

NetboxLogout clears the Skyforge session cookie and redirects to the Skyforge
landing page.
NetboxLogoutAny handles `/netbox/logout/*` (including a trailing slash).
FrontendNotifications serves the SPA notifications page.

get.summary: GetUserNotifications retrieves notifications for a specific user.

delete.summary: DeleteNotification deletes a notification.

put.summary: MarkNotificationAsRead marks a notification as read.

get.summary: OpenAPI serves the OpenAPI schema (alias for tooling and docs UIs).
Redoc serves offline API docs.
FrontendRobots serves robots.txt.
FrontendSNMP serves the SPA for SNMP routes.
FrontendStatus serves the SPA status page.

get.description: This is designed for an unauthenticated landing page and must not leak user identifiers.

StatusSummaryEvents streams the platform status summary as Server-Sent Events
(SSE).

post.summary: Delete removes an object from the bucket.

users.

get.description: Skyforge uses username-based identities, so \`id\` is the username.
